name: Sala - Red Scales
text: Once per turn: You can return one "Sala -" card from your Pendulum Zone to your hand; Place this card in the Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Sala -" Monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can return one "Sala -" monster you control to the hand and target one monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Sala - Red Scale" once per turn.
